info.title: DonorsChoose.org
info.description: Help classroom projects by integrating project information and donation functionality into your app.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: If you wish to wrap your response in a callback function, include the name here.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: By default, the start index of the result set is 0; for example, by setting index=10 and max=10, you can return rows 10-19.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: By default, the maximum number of projects returned is 10; you can request up to 50 rows at a time.

parameters.name: showSynopsis
parameters.description: To show the synopsis for each project listing set this to true.

parameters.name: showFacetCounts
parameters.description: To show facet counts set this to true. They will appear after the project listings.

parameters.name: showZeroFacetCountsForSchools
parameters.description: Facet counts will be displayed for all schools--including those with zero live projects--if this parameter is set to true and showFacetCounts is set to true and school counts are displayed because there is a community parameter in the search parameters.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description:
To search for a phrase, enclose it in quotes. It gets a list of projects where the keyword search matches any of the following fields:
- id
- title
- synopsis (full length project essay; not returned in JSON)
- short description
- fulfillment trailer
- school name
- teacher's first name (not returned in JSON)
- teacher's last name (only initial returned in JSON)
- city
- county (not returned in JSON)
- district (not returned in JSON)
- ward/neighborhood (not returned in JSON)
- state (e.g. TX)
- zip (not returned in JSON)
- subject name

parameters.name: subject1
parameters.description:
Search for subjects:
Music & The Arts - subject1=-1 
Performing Arts  - subject1=1 
Visual Arts      - subject1=11 
Music            - subject1=12

parameters.name: subject2
parameters.description:
Search for subjects:
Health & Sports   - subject2=-2
Sports            - subject2=2
Health & Wellness - subject2=27  
Nutrition         - subject2=28 
Gym & Fitness	  - subject2=29

parameters.name: subject3
parameters.description:
Search for subjects:
History & Civics    - subject3=-3
History & Geography - subject3=9
Civics & Government - subject3=13
Economics           - subject3=14
Social Sciences     - subject3=15

parameters.name: subject4
parameters.description:
Search for subjects:
Math & Science        - subject4=-4 
Health & Life Science - subject4=4
Applied Science       - subject4=6
Environmental Science - subject4=7
Mathematics	          - subject4=8

parameters.name: subject5
parameters.description:
Search for subjects:
Applied Learning      - subject5=-5
Early Development     - subject5=18
Community Service     - subject5=21
Character Education   - subject5=26
College & Career Prep - subject5=16 
Extra Curricular      - subject5=17
Parental Involvement  - subject5=20
Other                 - subject5=19

parameters.name: subject6
parameters.description:
Search for subjects:
Literacy & Language  - subject6=-6
Literacy             - subject6=10
Literature & Writing - subject6=3 
Foreign Languages    - subject6=22
ESL	                 - subject6=25

parameters.name: subject7
parameters.description:
Search for subjects:
Special Needs - subject7=-7

parameters.name: partiallyFunded
parameters.description:
Some Received: Projects that have already received partial donations - partiallyFunded=yes	
None Yet: Projects that haven't yet received a donation - partiallyFunded=no

parameters.name: partiallyFunded
parameters.description: High Level of Poverty. Projects from high need and high poverty schools (40% or more students receive free lunch).

parameters.name: teacherNotFunded
parameters.description: Never Before Funded. Projects from teachers that have never had a project funded.

parameters.name: costToComplete
parameters.description:
$99 or less -	costToComplete=1
$100-$200 - costToComplete=2
$200-$1,000 - costToComplete=3
$1,000-above - costToComplete=4

parameters.name: costToCompleteRange
parameters.description: Cost to Complete Range. Example: costToCompleteRange=0+TO+400. Please note that when costToCompleteRange is set, costToComplete is ignored.

parameters.name: proposalType
parameters.description:
Books - proposalType=1
Technology - proposalType=2
Supplies - proposalType=3
Trips - proposalType=4
Visitors - proposalType=5
Other - proposalType=6

parameters.name: proposalTypeCombo
parameters.description:
Trips & Visitors - proposalTypeCombo=TripsVisitors
Supplies - proposalTypeCombo=Supplies

parameters.name: gradeType
parameters.description:
Grades PreK-2	 - gradeType=1
Grades 3-5	- gradeType=2
Grades 6-8	- gradeType=3
High School	- gradeType=4
Adult Ed	- gradeType=5

parameters.name: resourceUsage
parameters.description:
Essential - resourceUsage=1
Enrichment - resourceUsage=2

parameters.name: teacherType
parameters.description: Teach For America	 - teacherType=1

parameters.name: schoolType
parameters.description:
Charter School - schoolType=1
Magnet School - schoolType=4
Year Round School - schoolType=5

parameters.name: challengeId
parameters.description: Giving Page ID. Example: challengeId=18369

parameters.name: matchingId
parameters.description: Example: matchingId=6. Please use the "Match Offers" filter on our Search Projects page to get the matching grant value you need.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: To search by state code (e.g. TX) you can either do a keyword search or use the state parameter (e.g. state=TX).

parameters.name: community
parameters.description: Use the "Community" filter on our Search Projects page to get the community values you need.

parameters.name: cityName
parameters.description: City Name.

parameters.name: countyName
parameters.description: County Name.

parameters.name: school
parameters.description: to identify a specific school.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description:
You can sort your results by:
- Urgency: Shows projects with higher urgency at the top - sortBy=0
- Poverty: Shows projects from schools with the highest levels of poverty at the top - sortBy=1
- Cost: Shows projects with the lowest cost to complete at the top - sortBy=2
- Popularity: Shows projects with higher numbers of donors at the top - sortBy=4

parameters.name: historical
parameters.description: The historical=true parameter returns completed projects only. Without adding that parameter, the default behavior is to always return projects in need of funding.

parameters.name: nwLat
parameters.description: Specify the NW point using the parameters nwLat and nwLng.

parameters.name: nwLng
parameters.description: Specify the NW point using the parameters nwLat and nwLng.

parameters.name: seLat
parameters.description: Specify the SE point using seLat and seLng.

parameters.name: seLng
parameters.description: Specify the SE point using seLat and seLng.

parameters.name: centerLat
parameters.description: Specify the center point using the parameters centerLat and centerLng.

parameters.name: centerLng
parameters.description: Specify the center point using the parameters centerLat and centerLng.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Specify the radius using radius.

parameters.name: concise
parameters.description: If you are plotting potentially many points on a map, we recommend you use add the concise=true.

get.description: Specify the center point using the parameters centerLat and centerLng. Leave out the "radius" parameter.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Giving Page ID.

info.title: DonorsChoose.org
info.description: Help classroom projects by integrating project information and donation functionality into your app.
